description: First case of cholera is reported
Suspected cholera cases decline to 720 and 3 deaths over the year
After 3 years of no cases, another outbreak begins
Haiti has a peak of 474 suspected cases in one day
Suspected cases wane, averaging less than 100 per day
A second wave hits, peaking with 360 cases in a single day
A total of 63,603 suspected cases had afflicted Haiti
